ending_theme: #1: "Aishiterutte Sagebimasho!! (愛してるって呼びましょ!!) by Momo Kawanagare (Nao Touyama) (eps 1-2, 4-6, 8-12)
#2: "Kimi to Mita Hana, Kimi to Mita Sora (キミと見た花 キミと見た空)" by Momo (Nao Touyama) and Beni (You Taichi) (eps 3, 7, 13, 27, 30, 41-45, 48, 49)
#3: "Kimi no Mama de! (キミのままで!)" by Hachiko (Kana Yuuki), Hana Saryuu (M.A.O), Touri Fueyama (Ai Fukuda) (eps 14-18)
#4: "Katayaburi Science (型破りサイエンス) by Yuki Fuka (Azusa Satou), and Rui Aoi (Rui Tanabe) (eps 19-23)
#5: "Ima Koko ni Iru" (イマココニイル) by Beni Kinojou (You Taichi) (eps 24-26, 28-29)
#6: "Trouble Girls (トラブルガールズ)" by Beni Kinojou (You Taichi), Yuki Fuka (Azusa Satou), and Rui Aoi (Rui Tanabe) (eps 31-35)
#7: "Best Party" by Momo Kawanagare (Nao Touyama), Hachiko (Kana Yuuki), Hana Saryuu (M.A.O), Touri Fueyama (Ai Fukuda) (eps 36-40)
#8: "Momo Namiki (もも並木)" by Momo Kawanagare (Nao Touyama) (eps 46, 47, 50)
